text:
- Okay, so I'm gonna
channel my truth.

Because of my experience
and relationships

to the young couples
and family-daughter dynamics,

let go
of the [bleep] bull[bleep]
and just hold each other

and tell each other
that you love each other!
Don't be scared,

because you are worthy
of that love.

And I put that
into Pachamama.
- I don't feel comfortable

with us barking orders
at Thea and Brandon right now.
- I'm not barking.
I am frustrated because I feel

like the younger people
in the crowd

don't understand
how precious time is.

Just embrace the love
that you have,
and just be happy!

- This is spiritually
and emotionally abusive.

- Oh.
- I am not here for it!

- Am I being--
I didn't mean it--

I didn't mean it to anybody.
- No.

- Do you wanna get yours out
for her right now please?

- Get yours--get yours out.
Okay, that's what I had to say.

- But speak
about your experience.

Don't project
on other people right here.

- I'm not projecting.
Okay, you need to go.

- Oh, no, I'm sorry.
- No, you need to go.

- Finish if you're--
- Honey, no, I'm done.

- Yes.
- I'm done, I'm done.

- Let's lift each other up,
not read people
like they're just crazy!

Yes, you have some bull[bleep]
you need to work out,

but I'm not here
to attack you for it.
The projection stops with me.
I will not be manipulated!
[dramatic music]
I will not be used...for evil!

- It is very hard for me
to see how affected Atasiea is.

- Mummy water, please help us
bathe ourselves in the love.

- God bless him.
I feel for him.
Really, I feel so bad.

- Thank you for that.
- You're welcome, sister.

- Thank you...
- Thank you.

- For keeping me in check...
- Thank you.

- Putting that in line.
I appreciate and respect you.

- I see you.
- Totally.

- I love you.
- I love you too.
